thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: German Startups Group: To Issue Convertible Bond of EUR 3 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: German Startups Group: To Issue Convertible Bond of EUR 3 Mln
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - GERMAN STARTUPS GROUP GMBH & CO KGAA :
* DGAP-NEWS: GERMAN STARTUPS GROUP GMBH & CO. KGAA: GERMAN STARTUPS GROUP PLANS TO ISSUE A CONVERTIBLE BOND
* GERMAN STARTUPS GROUP - ‍INTENDS TO ISSUE A CONVERTIBLE BOND OF 3M EUR, WITHOUT SUBSCRIPTION RIGHTS OF SHAREHOLDERS​
* BOND SHALL BE CONVERTIBLE INTO 1.198.330 SHARES, TERM 5 YEARS, INTEREST RATE 8% P.A
* BOND CONVERSION PRICE 2.50 EUR PER * ‍POTENTIAL BUYER INTENDS TO SUBSCRIBE FOR CONVERTIBLE BOND IN FULL​
* BOND CONVERSION PRICE 2.50 EUR PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
